overview:
Nacho Garcia is an entrepreneur with industry experience in consulting. As an entrepreneur is co-founder of Zeerca as well as part of the team developing the most successful MVNO business in Spain, KPN.

A Mechanical Engineer from Universidad Carlos III de Madrid and International MBA from IE Business School, Nacho started his career in different consulting firms, such as Oliver Wyman, with special focus in strategy and operations in the energy and telecom sector. With a deep passion for start-ups, Nacho joined KPN in 2009 leading partnerships and business development activities.

Nacho is co-founder of Zeerca, CEO of the company as well as leading the strategy and marketing activities within the organization.
